componentDescription: A versatile layout component for navigation or content, typically positioned at the screen edges.

children.description: The content to be rendered within the sidebar component.

position.description: Determines the position of the sidebar on the screen (e.g., 'left', 'right').

size.description: Specifies the predefined size variant of the sidebar.

variant.description: Defines the visual style and behavior of the sidebar (e.g., 'permanent', 'temporary', 'collapsed').

defaultExpanded.description: Sets the initial expanded state of the sidebar when it first renders.

expanded.description: Controls the expanded state of the sidebar, making it a controlled component.

onExpandedChange.description: Callback function invoked when the sidebar's expanded state changes.

fixed.description: When true, the sidebar remains fixed on the screen, not scrolling with page content.

hasBackdrop.description: If true, a backdrop overlay is shown when the sidebar is open, typically for temporary variants.

showToggleButton.description: Determines whether an internal toggle button for expanding/collapsing the sidebar is displayed.

expandedWidth.description: Specifies the width of the sidebar when it is in the expanded state.

collapsedWidth.description: Specifies the width of the sidebar when it is in the collapsed state.

breakpoint.description: Defines the screen width breakpoint at which the sidebar's behavior or variant might change.

breakpointBehavior.description: Specifies how the sidebar should adapt or change its behavior when the defined breakpoint is met.

elevation.description: Controls the shadow effect or 'elevation' of the sidebar, indicating its depth relative to the surface.

transitionPreset.description: Defines a preset for the animation and transition effects applied to the sidebar.

ariaLabel.description: Provides an accessible label for the sidebar component for screen readers.

views.description: Allows for overriding default styles or passing custom view props to different parts of the sidebar.
